config.script:
# Print event details for debugging
    print(event)  # This helps see the structure of event in logs

    # Try accessing the clicked bar's name
    startDate = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Start DateTimeInput").props.value
    endDate = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("End DateTimeInput").props.value
    pIID = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
    Reason  = self.props.selection.data[0].Reason

    # Open the pop-up with the selected bar's name as a parameter
    system.perspective.openPopup(
        id="barDetailsPopup",
        view="Demo/NestedViewDemo/DowntimeTrend",  # Change to your actual pop-up path
        title = Reason,
        resizable = True,
        params={"StartTime": startDate, "EndTime": endDate, "ProductionLineID": pIID, "Reason": Reason}
    )

# Print event details for debugging
    print(event)  # This helps see the structure of event in logs

    # Try accessing the clicked bar's name
    startDate = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Start DateTimeInput").props.value
    endDate = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("End DateTimeInput").props.value
    pIID = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
    Reason  = self.props.selection.data[0].Reason

    # Open the pop-up with the selected bar's name as a parameter
    system.perspective.openPopup(
        id="barDetailsPopup",
        view="Demo/NestedViewDemo/ScrapTrend", # Change to your actual pop-up path
        title = Reason,
        resizable = True,
        params={"StartTime": startDate, "EndTime": endDate, "ProductionLineID": pIID, "Reason": Reason}
    )
